text: Annabella Sciorra (born March 29, 1960) is an American television and movie actress. Her parents are of Italian origin. She has performed in television programs and movies. She was featured in Spike Lee's 1991 Jungle Fever. Other notable movies she starred in include Internal Affairs (1990), The Hand That Rocks the Cradle (1992) and Romeo Is Bleeding (1993). Sciorra was born in Brooklyn, New York City. == Other websites == * Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:People from New York City Category:1960 births Category:Living people
title: Annabella Sciorra
